text: Gerald Gradwohl (born 15 April 1967) is an Austrian guitarist who performed with Tangerine Dream from 1995 to 2006. He attended the J.M. Hauer Music School in Vienna studying classical guitar and jazz guitar and received a diploma in 1989 after only two and a half years. Gradwohl has released two solo CDs in Europe entitled ABQ and Tritone Barrier. He has also been a bandleader for European bands Threeo, Cats & Camel and The Powergrade as well as Harald Winkum. ==References== * Gradwohl's web page * [ Allmusic.com article on Gradwohl] * Guitar Nine biography of Gradwohl Category:Austrian classical guitarists Category:Austrian jazz guitarists Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Gerald Gradwohl
